article_text:
Debate is expected to return in General Assembly’s short session

Rep. Mike Hager has fought renewable energy requirements

Advocacy group hosting town halls across state to bring attention to issue

article_metadata.news-keywords: energy, alternative energy, renewable energy, Americans for Prosperity, Donald Bryson, General Assembly, Mike Hager, Sierra Club, renewable energy portfolio, Cassie Gavin, Molly Diggins
article_metadata.description: North Carolina has been home to a thriving solar industry for the past eight years, thanks to a tax break and requiring utilities to develop clean energy.
article_metadata.title: Clean energy mandates remain battleground | News & Observer
